      • increaseTotalTeams

        public boolean increaseTotalTeams()
        Checks if the maximum allowed number of teams is reached and if not, resets the simulation by incrementing current number of teams.
        Returns:
        true if further increase in team numbers is allowed.

      • decreaseTotalTeams

        public boolean decreaseTotalTeams()
        Checks if the minimum allowed number of teams is reached and if not, resets the simulation by decrementing current number of teams.
        Returns:
        true if further decrease in team numbers is allowed.

        Checks if the minimum allowed game speed is reached and if not, resumes the simulation by decrementing step time by 5.

        true if further increase in speed is allowed.
